Name: Image.Brightness
Desc: Adjusts the brightness of the image.
LongDesc: The Brightness method increases or decreases the brightness of the image by adding a value to each color channel. It supports clamping and alpha preservation for safe and flexible adjustments.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 300, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Brightness(40); });
